name: Fly Squirrel Fly!
description:
Play as "Squizza" the flying squirrel as you battle, jump and glide your way in side scrolling action against owls, deadly bunnies and your arch nemesis!

Simple controls:

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • D Key for Flying Charge
  • F Key for Squizza Slash (Shuriken)
  • HOLD SPACE to Jump High, then SPACE again to "double jump"
  • HOLD SHIFT to have Sonic Speed (Run)
